subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Playing without Carmelo Anthony or Raymond Felton again, the Knicks rallied from a 27-point deficit on the road, but Sacramento’s James Johnson made a 3-pointer as time expired.
snippet: Playing without Carmelo Anthony or Raymond Felton again, the Knicks rallied from a 27-point deficit on the road, but Sacramento’s James Johnson made a 3-pointer as time expired.
